source: MTYP 008-018 OMPS TOTAL COLUMN OZONE (VERSION 8 BUFR)
platform_description: Joint Polar Satellite System operaring since 2011 from 833 km altitude in sunsychronous orbits
sensor_description: UV grating spectrometer of spectral resolution 1 nm (sampling at 0.42 nm); corss-track mapper for total ozone: 300-380 nm; corss-track swath 2800 km; along-track one 50-km strip in 7.6 s
data_description: OMPS TC is the Total Column Ozone derived from UV and near-infrared observations (between 300-380 nm) made by the OMPS Nadir Total Column Mapper S-NPP (50 km) and N-21 (10 km)
